com.lukflug.panelstudio.hud

Class HUDPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.FocusableComponent
      • com.lukflug.panelstudio.CollapsibleContainer
        • com.lukflug.panelstudio.DraggableContainer
          • com.lukflug.panelstudio.hud.HUDPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, FixedComponent, Toggleable

    public class HUDPanel
extends DraggableContainer
    Panel holding an HUD component.

                Toggleable open,
                Animation animation,
                Toggleable guiOpen,
                int minBorder)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        component - the component
        renderer - the renderer for this container
        open - toggleable indicating whether the container is open or closed
        animation - the animation for opening and closing this container
        guiOpen - whether to accept input and render container itself or not
        minBorder - the minimum border for the container
